gov.ornl.keva.sstable

Class DefaultSSTable

  • java.lang.Object
    • gov.ornl.keva.sstable.SSTable
      • gov.ornl.keva.sstable.DefaultSSTable

  • public class DefaultSSTable
extends SSTable
    A simple SSTable implementation that writes all data one record at a time without using compression.
    Author:
    James Horey

      • delete

        public void delete()
        Delete the sstable. This involves the following steps: (1) Deleting the actual data file. (2) Deleting the key index file. (3) Deleting the bloom filter file.
        Specified by:
        delete in class SSTable

      • merge

        public SSTable merge(java.util.List<SSTable> tables,
            java.lang.String dataPath,
            java.lang.String indexPath,
            java.lang.String filterPath)
        Merge this sstable with the other tables and form a single table. This is useful to reduce disk I/O once tables get large.
        Specified by:
        merge in class SSTable
        Parameters:
        tables - SStables to merge
        dataPath - Data path of new sstable
        indexPath - Index path of new sstable
        filterPath - Filter path of new sstable
        Returns:
        New sstable

      • getCollapsed

        Get all the latest, independent values associated with this key. We will need to go through the bucket to reconstruct the latest values.
        Specified by:

        Parameters:

      • getCollapsed

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,StreamIterator<TableValue>> getCollapsed(TableKey key,
                                                                      long time)
        Get all the latest, independent values associated with this key. We will need to go through the bucket to reconstruct the latest values.
        Specified by:
        getCollapsed in class SSTable
        Parameters:
        key - The table key used to identify the value
        time - Prune all values with a wall time less than this time
        Returns:
        An iterator over the final, independent values associated with the key

      • getCollapsed

        public java.util.Map<java.lang.String,StreamIterator<TableValue>> getCollapsed(TableKey key,
                                                                      java.lang.String branch)
        Get all the latest, independent values associated with this key on the specified branch. Since this is a collapsed value, we should only return a single value.
        Specified by:
        getCollapsed in class SSTable
        Parameters:
        key - The table key used to identify the value
        Returns:
